pkgmetadata.longdescription: Include Tables, Images and Graphs in Leaflet Pop-Ups // Creates 'HTML' strings to embed tables, images or graphs in pop-ups of interactive maps created with packages like 'leaflet' or 'mapview'. Handles local images located on the file system or via remote URL. Handles graphs created with 'lattice' or 'ggplot2' as well as interactive plots created with 'htmlwidgets'.
